articles.title: Gold Prices Surge to Record High of $4,079 Amid Geopolitical Tensions
articles.description: Gold futures reached an all-time high as investors seek safe-haven assets amid escalating global uncertainties and central bank buying.

articles.title: JP Morgan Forecasts Gold to Reach $4,500 by Q2 2026
articles.description: Leading investment bank predicts continued gold price appreciation driven by monetary policy shifts and sustained central bank demand.

articles.title: Central Banks Increase Gold Reserves by 15% in 2025
articles.description: Global central banks continue aggressive gold accumulation strategy, with emerging markets leading the buying spree.

articles.title: Gold ETF Inflows Hit $12 Billion as Institutional Interest Grows
articles.description: Institutional investors pour record amounts into gold-backed ETFs, signaling strong confidence in precious metals sector.

articles.title: Technical Analysis: Gold Breaks Key Resistance at $4,000
articles.description: Gold's breakthrough above the $4,000 psychological barrier opens path for further gains, technical analysts suggest.

articles.title: Mining Costs Rise 8% as Gold Production Faces Challenges
articles.description: Increased operational costs and supply constraints support higher gold prices as production growth slows globally.

articles.title: Dollar Weakness Fuels Gold Rally to Multi-Year Highs
articles.description: Declining U.S. dollar index provides additional tailwind for gold prices as international buyers increase purchases.

articles.title: Gold Volatility Creates Trading Opportunities for Algorithmic Systems
articles.description: Increased price swings in gold markets present ideal conditions for sophisticated automated trading strategies.
